column4: I am installing ubuntu right now to a 4 gig USB flash drive, in the backround, under Qemu, accelerated with Kqemu. This is USB 1.1.... even still, it has been installing for 3 hours now and its only at 47%
Its installing at a steady speed of about 1% every 5 to 6 minutes, is this normal even for USB 1.1?
can you not just install it normally (i.e. not within qemu)?
No, I am using it specifically as an embedded within windows flash drive install
